google_play_reviews.content: Thank you so much for creating this app. I absolutely love it. It is refreshing to see apps created to make a positive improvement in the life of others and not created with money making in mind. As a request for future improvements, if it is doable, I would suggest bulk import of multiple days videos or crop for videos to transform them from vertical to horizontal. You are amazing nevertheless. Thank you 🌞🤗
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the kind words! Both items are on the backlog for future versions, please kindly wait for it 😊.

google_play_reviews.content: Absolutely amazing app I am absolutely in love with it
I was loving the app but it's started to get rid of my videos. This is far from needed when I'm trying to document the day in day out growth of my newborn.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matthew, One Second Diary doesn't delete its own files without user's input. Me and other users have been using the app for more than a year and this never happened. Please e-mail me at kylekundev@gmail.com so that we can try to recover the videos and discover the cause.

google_play_reviews.content: It would be a great app if it didn't delete all my saved videos and movies about once a month, please get this sorted
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The app never deletes files on its own, I myself have been recording for 2+ years and this never happened. Please make sure you don't have any backup apps doing this or accidentally deleted files inside DCIM folder. I can help investigate this further, just send me an e-mail with your device model name, Android version and more details.

google_play_reviews.content: Great but would like vertical video option Edit: Thank you, I will kindly wait too :D
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review! Vertical exporting is coming soon in a future update, please kindly wait for it 😊

google_play_reviews.content: Does exactly what you expect. Select a video, cut it to the length you want, save it. Then combine all clips into one collection video. Free, no ads, and a lot of the functionality that is either restricted to pro plans or not available (no watermarks, various clip lengths, local backups, etc).
Why there are no reviews it is a gud app
Great app Wish it allowed photos too, not just videos
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Alex, it will be available in a future version! Thanks 😊

google_play_reviews.content: Has a lot of promise but needs a few things. Selecting add video to a date should take you to videos from that date. It takes forever to scroll through and find videos from that day if they aren't recent. Also the date in the corner of the video is tiny. And there should be a way to select exactly two seconds or three seconds, etc without having to guess by moving the tiny slider back and forth. Would also be nice to specify where videos are saved. Not all gallery apps can see subfolders.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for your feedback, most of the things you said were implemented in the latest update, please check it out!

google_play_reviews.content: Great app, easy to use, thank you for sharing!

Very creative concept and does all that it says! If more thought can be put into the UX (before any media has been created by the user), more people will come to appreciate all the hard Work and Creativity that has been put into this app. I certainly appreciate it.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review! As a solo developer I certainly struggle a bit with UI/UX and I know the app has lots of room for improvement, which I plan on doing in the future for v2.0 - a complete overhaul of the design. I hope you can stay till then 🙏

google_play_reviews.content: Simple but perfect. Have no issues so far and the fact that there's no ads or app purchases is incredible. Great job developer!!
